question:
Consider the following hydropower projects with states where they are/have been installed:
  1. Naitwar Mori Hydro Electric Project- Uttarakhand
  2. Parbati Hydroelectric Project (III)- Himachal Pradesh
  3. Ratle Hydroelectric Project- Jammu & Kashmir
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: The third phase of Parbati Hydroelectric Project is being installed on River Parbati in Kullu district of Himachal Pradesh. The Ratle Hydroelectric Plant is a run-of-the-river hydroelectric power station currently under construction on the Chenab River, in Ratle village of Jammu & Kashmir. Naitwar Mori Hydro Electric Project (NMHEP) is a 60MW project being installed on river Tons â€“ a tributary of the Yamuna, in Uttarkashi district of Uttarakhand.
